name: ACH_MINIONS_IN_AIR
description: Kill 50 minions while they are in the air.

name: ACH_HOME_GUARDIANS
description: Place 100 guardians in their home locations.

name: ACH_STARTER_HEROES_WIN
description: Win 1 match with all 3 free starter heroes.

name: ACH_PARTY_LEADER
description: Win 5 games as a party leader.

name: ACH_RIFT_BUSTER
description: Destroy or help to destroy 100 unstable rifts.

name: ACH_RING_OF_FIRE
description: Catch 75 minions on fire at the same time with Smolder.

name: ACH_IVY_E
description: Kill 250 minions ensnared by Reach of Roots with Ivy.

name: ACH_HOGARTH_SECONDARY
description: Deal 2000 damage to an enemy with a single CATCH! by Hogarth.

name: ACH_DOBBIN_COINBAG
description: Pick up 1000 coin bags with Dobbin.

name: ACH_MIDNIGHT_PROWL
description: Stay in Prowl for a total of 60min as Midnight.

name: ACH_STINKEYE_ORBS
description: Pick up 250 mana orbs with Stinkeye.

name: ACH_ZOEY_SECONDARY
description: Knock 1,000 minions into battleground hazards with Zoey's Book Club.

name: ACH_OZIEL_SOULS
description: Collect 500 soul stacks in a single match with Oziel.

name: ACH_WARMAGE_Q
description: Deal 20,000 in damage to minions with Can't Touch This.

name: ACH_BIONKA_DAMAGE
description: Deal 200,000 damage in a single match with Bionka.

name: ACH_BLACKPAW_PASSIVE
description: Kill a minion in midair with Blackpaw's Pounce.

name: ACH_FIVE_STAR_NATURAL
description: Five star a master or rift lord battleground without any players going Unchained.

name: ACH_UNCHAINED_HOUR
description: Be Unchained for a total of 1 hour.

name: ACH_MINION_HAZARDS
description: Kill 1,000 minions by knocking them into battleground hazards.

name: ACH_TUNDRA_SHIFT
description: Roll 250,000 meters in battle with Tundra's Avalanche.

name: ACH_GABRIELLA_SECONDARY
description: Kill 30 enemies within 1s of using Gabriella's Kinetic Pulse.

name: ACH_OZIEL_SECONDARY
description: Deal 1,000 damage with Oziel's Wraith Surge.

name: ACH_MIDNIGHT_SECONDARY
description: Kill 100 kobolds with Midnight's Shadow Swipe.

name: ACH_BIONKA_SECONDARY
description: Kill 5,000 enemies with Slam It Down.

name: ACH_THREE_STAR_RIFTLORD
description: Earn 3 or more stars on every rift lord battleground.

name: ACH_THREE_STAR_WARMAGE
description: Earn 3 or more stars on every war mage battleground.

name: ACH_DOBBIN_E
description: Kill 150 enemies in 1 match with Dobbin's Spare Dynamite.

name: ACH_HOGARTH_PASSIVE
description: Earn 50 stacks of ANGRY! at once with Hogarth.

name: ACH_BLACKPAW_INAIR
description: Use Blackpaw's Pounce 1,000 times during battle.

name: ACH_IVY_SECONDARY
description: Kill 500 enemies by knocking them into hazards with Ivy's Penetrating Arrow.

name: ACH_BLOODSPIKE_SHIFT
description: Use Bloodspike's Homicidal Frenzy 30x during battle.

name: ACH_SMOLDER_NAPTHA
description: Deal damage to 1,000 enemies with Smolder using naphtha.

name: ACH_GABRIELLA_E
description: Mesmerize 50 enemies with a single Devious Allure from Gabriella.

name: ACH_MAXIMILIAN_E
description: Kill 50 enemies with a single In Your Faces from Maximilian.

name: ACH_OIL_GALLONS_1000
description: Deal damage with 1,000 gallons of boiling oil.

name: ACH_THREE_STAR_MASTER
description: Earn 3 or more stars on every master battleground.

name: ACH_OZIEL_PASSIVE
description: Collect 2,000 soul stacks in 1 match with Oziel.

name: ACH_STINKEYE_SECONDARY
description: Kill 1,000 enemies with Stinkeye's Arcane Anomaly.

name: ACH_TEMPER_KILL_WITH_HAZARDS
description: Kill 500 enemies by knocking them into hazards with Temper's Bull Rush.

name: ACH_TEMPER_USE_EXPLOSION
description: Reach max rage with Rage of the Forge 50x.

name: ACH_SCROLL_RESURRECT_TEAMMATES
description: Resurrect 10 teammates with scroll of resurrection.

name: ACH_RIFT_POINTS_SAVED
description: Prevent the loss of 50 rift points with scroll of the empty rift.

name: ACH_SMOLDER_KILL_WITH_PASSIVE
description: Kill 500 enemies with Smolder's From the Ashes.

name: ACH_BLOODSPIKE_EXECUTE_OGRES
description: Kill 50 full-health ogres with Bloodspike's Stunning Execution.

name: ACH_IVY_DAMAGE_MINIONS_WITH_PENETRATING_SHOT
description: Hit 5,000 enemies with Ivy's penetrating arrow.

name: ACH_BLACKPAW_SUMMON_GNOLLS
description: Summon 100 gnolls during battle with Blackpaw.

name: ACH_DOBBIN_DIG_MINESHAFTS
description: Use Dobbin's Mineshaft Shortcut 200x in a match he wins.

name: ACH_MIDNIGHT_DASH_DISTANCE
description: Run 26.2 miles with Midnight's Dash and Slash during battle.

name: ACH_ZOEY_CHANGE_SCHOOLS
description: Change magic school in battle 250x as Zoey.

name: ACH_ZOEY_PET_KILLS
description: Kill 500 enemies with Zoey's pet, Feebee.

name: ACH_ZOEY_STUN_YOURSELF
description: Get stunned by Zoey's Chaos Tome backfiring 15x during battle.

name: ACH_OZIEL_DAMAGE_SELF_WITH_LIFE_TAP
description: Deal 25,000 damage to Oziel using Oziel's Essence Siphon.

name: ACH_UNLOCK_SABOTAGE
description: Achieve level 5 to unlock Sabotage mode.

name: ACH_DEADEYE_BOMB
description: Hit 5000 enemies with Deadeye's Bouncing Bomb.

name: ACH_DEADEYE_STACKS
description: Obtain 1000 stacks of Infamy with Deadeye.

name: ACH_DEADEYE_USE_DASH
description: Use Deadeye's "Outta the Way" ability 500x in combat.

name: ACH_MASTER_CHAIN_LIGHTNING_KILLS
description: Kill 2500 minions with Cygnus's Chain Lightning ability.

name: ACH_YILIN_USE_RC
description: Use Yi-Lin's Imperial Reach ability 100x in combat.

name: ACH_YILIN_E_HITS
description: Hit 2500 enemies with Yi-Lin's Tempest Strike ability.

name: ACH_BRASS_RC_KILLS
description: Kill 2,500 enemies with Brass using Cannonball.

name: ACH_BRASS_PICKUP_COINBAGS
description: Pickup 500 of Dobbin's coins as Brass.
